trans-unit.source: This interface represents a collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.Product" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個介面表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.Product" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection is a closed set generated by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder" /> based on the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder.Path" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 該集合是由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder" /> 根據 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder.Path" /> 屬性所產生的封閉式集合。

trans-unit.source: The client cannot add or remove items from this collection.
trans-unit.target: 此用戶端無法加入或移除此集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the product collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得產品集合中所包含的項目數。

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the number of elements contained in the product collection.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示產品集合中所包含的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the product collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可逐一查看此產品集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can iterate through the product collection.
trans-unit.target: 可逐一查看此產品集合的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之項目的以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the product at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定索引處的產品。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.Product" /> object that represents the product at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.Product" /> 物件，表示在指定索引處的產品。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the product to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之產品的唯一識別項

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the product with the specified product code.
trans-unit.target: 擷取具有指定產品代碼的產品。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.Product" /> object with the specified product code.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之產品代碼的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.Product" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns null if the specified product code is not found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到指定的產品代碼，則傳回 null。
